plot: Peter is frustrated because the search for his mother has not progressed. Mrs. Meinhart met the dentist Joseph Mader in the dance club, who is very sympathetic to her. Clemens wants to have a comradely fatherly conversation with his son Heiko. The attempt goes down the drain. Heiko doesn't want to be told anything more. Vera lets herself go more and more and is constantly drunk. Peter takes care of her and puts her to bed. Denise tells Bertram that there won't be another baby.
